website_summaries.verdict: This primer truly grips onto you makeup and doesn't let go so you can look fresh all day long.
pros: Hemp seed, cactus extract, and aloe water hydrate skin and provide helpful antioxidants
Thick gel-like primer is easy to apply and adheres to all skin types
Skin appears dewy without letting oil shine through
Foundation looks freshly applied for hours
cons: Primer is quite tacky and takes a while to dry

customer_reviews.title: Not the miracle everyone says.
customer_reviews.text: Not bad but not worth the hype in my opinion. I’m oily and this isn’t the fix. I don’t think it but it again unless it was on sale.
customer_reviews.author: miriam and Jared

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't supposed to arrive till like the 8th got it on the 3rd the lil box was cute and this product is now my holy Grail of primers definitely worth the money..
customer_reviews.author: Stacey faucett

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: For the money this product did not hold up. Leaves face feeling very oily, and I have dry skin. Was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Morgen Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Grips my corrector, concealer and foundation.
customer_reviews.text: I'm sooo in love with this primer. Girls it's a must have ❣
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely in love!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be more ecstatic about this primer! It's worth every penny, I can't believe how amazing this holds my makeup on all day and night. Leaves my face hydrated and pores at bay. Easy application and texture is tacy and has a cooling effect. Definitely the primer for me. I wont be buying any other primer! Highly recommend. Definitely going to try more products from milk in the future.
customer_reviews.author: katelynn haynie

customer_reviews.title: Love this primer!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. Little goes a long way. Love this primer! HUGE amount in the big bottle.
customer_reviews.author: K. M. Davis

customer_reviews.title: This is the primer to have
customer_reviews.text: I’m not going to lie like I was skeptical about buying a $40 primer but my make up has not ever looked so great ! Definitely gets tacky but that’s what helps the foundation sticks strong and lasts all dayv
customer_reviews.author: Sameisha Young

customer_reviews.title: Not for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: Did nothing to fill pores caused me to break out and made skin very very oily
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie Campbell

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this primer! You don't have to use much and its very sticky so it helps my makeup stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Meagain93

customer_reviews.title: love ittttt
customer_reviews.text: Size is big! price is pricey too, but it’s a great product and probably cheaper here too.
customer_reviews.author: abigail

customer_reviews.title: Best primer
customer_reviews.text: It covers my pores and makes my foundation go on so smoothly!!
customer_reviews.author: maddiboudreaux

customer_reviews.title: BAD BAD BAD
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is like gross sticky glue. It’s not moisturizing, it’s AWFUL. I’ve never ever tried a primer like this and I never will again. Does nothing to help with pores or texture just a sticky mess. And yes Iwaited Five minutes before applying makeup. Still a total mess
customer_reviews.author: sara scoco

customer_reviews.title: Really works,  grips makeup well.
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute Best Primer I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Mignault

customer_reviews.title: Love this sticky primer!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this primer! It’s perfectly light and sticky. I was apprehensive purchasing it because of the size vs prize but I’m so happy I went ahead and got it. I used one pump for my entire face. I don’t wear makeup every day so it’ll last me a good bit but I think a bottle is pretty good for an every user and will last maybe 3-4 weeks if using just one pump. Just my opinion though! I will be purchasing again. Adding a photo, I did my makeup at 3pm it’s now 1:30am and my makeup is still flawless!
customer_reviews.author: Serrano Fam

customer_reviews.title: Love to love this product
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical to spend the money on this but I’m glad I did! The serum goes on smooth and easy and doesn’t dry sticky or thick it’s really amazing and I’ll continue to purchase it!
customer_reviews.author: Emiley

customer_reviews.title: Must buy for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I usually have quite dry skin but with this primer it helps keep me hydrated and keep the foundation in place.
customer_reviews.author: keara erickson

customer_reviews.title: grips like a pro!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! Your foundation will stay in place all day!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: MILK MAKEUP Hydro Grip Primer - Full Size 1.52 Oz.
product_meta.description:
This primer is formulated with aloe water, cherry blossom, hyaluronic acid, and B vitamins to support skin for a healthier-looking base, and provide a glassy, post-hot-yoga-class glow. The silicone-free, oil-free, green-tinted formula blends in clear to work across all skin tones and types. Simply allow the formula to sit for one minute to fully absorb and activate grip for the best results.
Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, and triclocarban, and contains less than one percent of synthetic fragrances. This product is also vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free.
This product is an Allure Best of Beauty award winner.
feature_bullets: A hydrating, makeup-gripping primer formulated with hemp-derived cannabis seed extract and blue agave extract for all-day hydration and hold
Hemp-Derived Cannabis Seed Extract: Hydrates and smooths the look of skin, while providing antioxidant benefits
Blue Agave Extract: Forms an invisible layer to grip makeup, smooth the look of texture, and seal in moisture
Prickly Pear Cactus Extract and Aloe Water: Hydrates, soothes, and calms skin
The silicone-free, oil-free, green-tinted formula blends in clear to work across all skin tones and types
